div.head: 帶下五漏
div.div: five types of leakage from below the belt

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: five types of leakage from below the belt

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with wu se dai 五色帶 , [downflow of] five colors [from below] the belt. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry di yu 地榆 quoting Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 : 帶下病 , “Diseases below the belt”, writes: 帶下五漏 , “ Five types of leakage from below the belt ”.
